messages.title: Labour: A Better Plan. A Better Future.
messages.content: Millionaires have thrived under this Tory government, but everybody else has lost out. Labour will be different. We'll protect the NHS, restore the 50p tax rate for the super-rich and make sure every share in the recovery, not just a privileged few.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raise the minimum wage to £8 an hour by 2020.
Endorse fair pay and end exploitative zero-hour contracts.
Secure the funds for an additional 8,000 GPs, tougher regulation on tobacco firms and a clamp down on tax avoidance, to fund the NHS.
Ensure that as many young people will start an apprenticeship as go to university by 2025, and provide a guaranteed job for 18-24 year olds out of work for a year.

issues.economy: Raise the minimum wage to £8 an hour by 2020.
issues.education: Ensure that as many young people will start an apprenticeship as go to university by 2025.
issues.health: Secure the funds for an additional 8,000 GPs, tougher regulation on tobacco firms and a clamp down on tax avoidance, to fund the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Endorse fair pay and end exploitative zero-hour contracts.

leaflet.personalStatement: Edward knows and cares about this area. He attended the local school and has family roots here going back 4 generations. He'll stand up for you, not for hedge-funds.

contactInformation.address: Leander House, St. Andrews Close, Alresford, Essex, CO7 8BL

endorsements.endorsement: I'm Edward's father and I'm very proud to endorse him as your Labour candidate.
I've spent most of my life in this area and was a shareholder of the Colchester Cooperative and then East of England Co-Operative for 25 years.
I'm endorsing Edward because he fights for us locally and I know he'll do the same in Parliament.
